docs.snippet: This country stands for the proposition that all men and women are created equal, that they have certain inalienable rights. And what that means is that if you could build a church on a site, you could build a synagogue on a site, if you could bui...
docs.lead_paragraph: This country stands for the proposition that all men and women are created equal, that they have certain inalienable rights. And what that means is that if you could build a church on a site, you could build a synagogue on a site, if you could build a Hindu temple on a site, then you should be able to build a mosque on the site. PRESIDENT OBAMA [A12]

docs.snippet: This was not a failure to collect intelligence, it was a failure to integrate and understand the intelligence that we already had.      PRESIDENT OBAMA,  after meeting with national  security advisers about a terror plot to bring down a  commercia...
docs.lead_paragraph: This was not a failure to collect intelligence, it was a failure to integrate and understand the intelligence that we already had. PRESIDENT OBAMA, after meeting with national security advisers about a terror plot to bring down a commercial jetliner on Christmas Day. [A11]

docs.snippet: It's naïve for us to think that we can grow our nuclear stockpiles, the Russians continue to grow their nuclear stockpiles, and our allies grow their nuclear stockpiles, and that in that environment we're going to be able to pressure countries li...
docs.lead_paragraph: It's naïve for us to think that we can grow our nuclear stockpiles, the Russians continue to grow their nuclear stockpiles, and our allies grow their nuclear stockpiles, and that in that environment we're going to be able to pressure countries like Iran and North Korea not to pursue nuclear weapons themselves. President Obama, [12]
